contentencoded: News of Twitter's impending initial public offering and a look at the social network's books, has left some wondering about growth potential. The company has a strong user base but does it have enough users? And will the users of Twitter's future offer up enough cash? Marketplace Tech reporter Queena Kim says that's the billion dollar question.
description: As Twitter becomes a public company, investors want to know if it has growth potential.

title: The billion dollar question behind Twitter's IPO
